MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7.30PM in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin following reports of third party damage to our underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.31PM on 20th April 2021.
